remarks: Calculate the value of the ` Ray ` function.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 21-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fvray $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( P e. ( EE ` N ) /\ A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ P =/= A ) ) -> ( P Ray A ) = { x e. ( EE ` N ) | P OutsideOf <. A , x >. } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d N x $.
$d P x $.
